shri lankawe siduwana minimarumwalin bahutharayak siduwanne idam prashna ha gatalu padanam kotagena yayi dakunu palath idam komasaris mahesh karunanayaka mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha mese pawasuwe galla wakwalla kalamanakarana puhunu aayathanaye pawathi idam nithiya pilibanda rajya niladharin danuwath kirime wadamuluwak amathamini.gam mattamin siduwana idam gatalu nirantharayen wisande nam rate siduwana me minimarum ha samaja gatalu bohodurata yam prathishathayak thula aduwi yanu athayi da ee mahatha pawasiya.me idam gatalu wisandima bohodurata winiwida bhawayen yuthuwa kala yuthuyi.
